reviewText: this video has been a favorite in my library that i turn to often for a "refresher" course in meditation.  it serves as a fantastic overview of what one can expect from  meditation.  and it covers different meditative techniques such as tratak or candle gazing meditation, meditation on a sound or an image and mantra meditation.  it can definitely serve as a starting point for the curious and the beginner as well as the more experienced practitioner of the art of meditation.
This 1 hour VHS tape is a good way to learn how to meditate, reduce stress and improve well-being.
